metadata.description: 台灣植物 RAG 文件集（增強版 - 含識別重點）
metadata.format: Enhanced with identification guide and key features
features: 結構化識別重點（葉、花、果、莖、根）

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：ramosissimum
學名：Equisetum ramosissimum

=== 識別重點 ===
【莖】 | 尺寸：20-160 cm tall; 1-7 mm in diameter

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 20-160 cm tall
2. sheaths longer than wide, the lower sheaths with a brown band, the upper ones green

=== 詳細描述 ===
Stems unbranched or with 2-3 branches per node, 20-160 cm tall, 1-7 mm in diameter; stomata in 1-3 lines in the grooves.sheaths longer than wide, the lower sheaths with a brown band, the upper ones green; teeth 3-9 mm long, having brown centers with white margins, when broken off, leaving a brown rim at top of sheaths. Strobili apiculate.Cross section of stem showing vallecular collenchyma not extending to vallecular canal; endodermis double, i.e. with an inner and outer endodermis.
key_features: 20-160 cm tall
sheaths longer than wide, the lower sheaths with a brown band, the upper ones green
documents.identification_guide: 【莖】 | 尺寸：20-160 cm tall; 1-7 mm in diameter

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：linearis
學名：pl. 1.

=== 識別重點 ===
【莖】 | 尺寸：20-100 cm tall; 2-3 mm across
【毛被】fronds with easily abraded branched or stellate hairs at forks and on rachises, costae, and costules

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 20-100 cm tall
2. fronds with easily abraded branched or stellate hairs at forks and on rachises, costae, and costules

=== 詳細描述 ===
Stipe 20-100 cm tall, 2-3 mm across; fronds with easily abraded branched or stellate hairs at forks and on rachises, costae, and costules; branching equal or nearly equal at forks; ultimate forks usually without reflexed accessory branches; stipule-like bract about 1 cm long, usually lobed at base; ultimate branches glaucous beneath, 15-30 cm long, 4-6 cm wide, widest near base; veinlets in groups of 3-4.Sori with 6-9 sporangia.There are many varieties of this species, some seem quite distinct and could be considered as species, but in most cases there is so much variation that even variety rank is questionable. There probably is a lot of hybridization.
key_features: 20-100 cm tall
fronds with easily abraded branched or stellate hairs at forks and on rachises, costae, and costules
documents.identification_guide:
【莖】 | 尺寸：20-100 cm tall; 2-3 mm across
【毛被】fronds with easily abraded branched or stellate hairs at forks and on rachises, costae, and costules

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：hirsuta
學名：Dennstaedtia hirsuta

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：oblong, lanceolate, acute | 顏色：brownish | 尺寸：10-28 cm long; 28 cm long
【莖】 | 尺寸：10-30 cm long; 30 cm long | 顏色：brownish, greenish, yellow, whitish
【根】 | Rhizome short-creeping, densely clothed with brownish long hairs, bearing a tuft
【毛被】Rhizome short-creeping, densely clothed with brownish long hairs, bearing a tuft of fronds
【質地】lamina 10-28 cm long, lanceolate, bipinnate, herbaceous, densely hairy

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 10-30 cm long
2. Rhizome short-creeping, densely clothed with brownish long hairs, bearing a tuft of fronds
3. lamina 10-28 cm long, lanceolate, bipinnate, herbaceous, densely hairy
4. Rhizome short-creeping, densely clothed with brownish long hairs, bearing a tuft of fronds

=== 詳細描述 ===
Rhizome short-creeping, densely clothed with brownish long hairs, bearing a tuft of fronds.Stipes 10-30 cm long, greenish-yellow, clothed with whitish to brownish long soft hairs; lamina 10-28 cm long, lanceolate, bipinnate, herbaceous, densely hairy; pinnules oblong, acute, serrate.Sori small; indusia globose, hairy.
key_features: 10-30 cm long
Rhizome short-creeping, densely clothed with brownish long hairs, bearing a tuft of fronds
lamina 10-28 cm long, lanceolate, bipinnate, herbaceous, densely hairy
Rhizome short-creeping, densely clothed with brownish long hairs, bearing a tuft of fronds

=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：aureum
學名：pl. 97.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：oblong, ovate
【根】 | Rhizome creeping, usually short, dictyostelic
【毛被】Frond fairly large, up to 1 m, oblong-ovate, simply pinnate, thick-coriaceous, glabrescent
【質地】Frond fairly large, up to 1 m, oblong-ovate, simply pinnate, thick-coriaceous, g

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. Frond fairly large, up to 1 m, oblong-ovate, simply pinnate, thick-coriaceous, glabrescent
2. Frond fairly large, up to 1 m, oblong-ovate, simply pinnate, thick-coriaceous, glabrescent

=== 詳細描述 ===
Rhizome creeping, usually short, dictyostelic.Frond fairly large, up to 1 m, oblong-ovate, simply pinnate, thick-coriaceous, glabrescent; pinnae many, simple, only the upper ones fertile.
key_features: Frond fairly large, up to 1 m, oblong-ovate, simply pinnate, thick-coriaceous, glabrescent

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：paleolata
學名：Dryopteris paleolata

=== 識別重點 ===
【莖】 | 尺寸：30-45cm long; 45cm long

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 30-45cm long
2. Indusia thin, brown, upper free, margin somewhat erose

=== 詳細描述 ===
Stipe 30-45cm long, stramineous, c. s. of base of stipe with about 5 bundles; laminae large, nearly as broad as long, basal pair of pinnae largest.Indusia thin, brown, upper free, margin somewhat erose.
key_features: 30-45cm long
Indusia thin, brown, upper free, margin somewhat erose
documents.identification_guide: 【莖】 | 尺寸：30-45cm long; 45cm long

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：conjugata
學名：pl. 54.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：lanceolate | 顏色：reddish, brown
【根】 | Rhizome about 1 cm in diameter
【毛被】young fronds densely covered with soft reddish-brown tomentum, especially on apices of lobes, mature

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. young fronds densely covered with soft reddish-brown tomentum, especially on apices of lobes, mature
2. Fronds fan-shaped, cut into 2 halves, main lobes of each half narrowly lanceolate, with 2 main veins
3. young fronds densely covered with soft reddish-brown tomentum, especially on apices of lobes, mature

=== 詳細描述 ===
Rhizome about 1 cm in diameter.Fronds fan-shaped, cut into 2 halves, main lobes of each half narrowly lanceolate, with 2 main veins in each lobe, divided over 3/4 of way to base, apices acuminate, margins thickened with coarse serratiion; main veins prominently raised; young fronds densely covered with soft reddish-brown tomentum, especially on apices of lobes, mature fronds glabrous and glaucous beneath.
key_features: young fronds densely covered with soft reddish-brown tomentum, especially on apices of lobes, mature
Fronds fan-shaped, cut into 2 halves, main lobes of each half narrowly lanceolate, with 2 main veins
young fronds densely covered with soft reddish-brown tomentum, especially on apices of lobes, mature
documents.identification_guide:

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：minuta
學名：fig. 2.

=== 識別重點 ===
【莖】 | 尺寸：8-10 cm long; 1-4 mm long
【根】 | rhizome internodes 6-9 cm long
【毛被】sporocarps 1-2, borne at or near base of stipe, on separate stalks, oval, hairy, the upper tooth acu

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 30 cm long
2. areolae linear, narrow
3. sporocarps 1-2, borne at or near base of stipe, on separate stalks, oval, hairy, the upper tooth acu

=== 詳細描述 ===
Summer, aquatic form: Plants growing in deep water have their leaflets floating on water, the succulent stipes up to 30 cm long; those in shallow water have erect stipes 8-10 cm long; leaflets 20 mm long, entire or crenate; areolae linear, narrow; rhizome internodes 6-9 cm long.Winter, terreestrial form: Plants growing on drained fields much small, the internodes short, about 1-4 mm long, the stipes 2-8 cm long; leaflets 5-10 mm long; sporocarps 1-2, borne at or near base of stipe, on separate stalks, oval, hairy, the upper tooth acute, the lower tooth blunt.
key_features: 30 cm long
areolae linear, narrow
sporocarps 1-2, borne at or near base of stipe, on separate stalks, oval, hairy, the upper tooth acu
documents.identification_guide:
【莖】 | 尺寸：8-10 cm long; 1-4 mm long
【根】 | rhizome internodes 6-9 cm long
【毛被】sporocarps 1-2, borne at or near base of stipe, on separate stalks, oval, hairy, the upper tooth acu

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：formosana
學名：fig. 24.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：oblong, elliptic, ovate | 尺寸：6–12 cm long; 2–5 cm wide
【花】 | 形狀：rounded, rhombic
【毛被】branchlets glabrous or slightly pubescent when young

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 40 cm across
2. Leaves alternate, elliptic, oblong to ovate-oblong, 6–12 cm long, 2–5 cm wide, acuminate at apex, br
3. branchlets glabrous or slightly pubescent when young

=== 詳細描述 ===
Deciduous trees, 20 m tall, 40 cm across; branchlets glabrous or slightly pubescent when young.Leaves alternate, elliptic, oblong to ovate-oblong, 6–12 cm long, 2–5 cm wide, acuminate at apex, broadly cuneate at base, glabrous or slightly pubescent when young, serrulate, lateral veins 6–7 pairs, midrib prominent beneath; petioles slender, 1.5–2.5 cm long.Staminate catkins at apex of branchlets, pendulous; bracts rhombic-rounded, each subtending 3 flowers; pistillate spikes at apex of old branchlets; bracts 3–4 mm long, woody, apex rounded, 5-lobed, each bract subtending 2 flowers; ovary 2-celled, each cell with 1 ovule; styles 2.Fruiting catkins 1–3 together, peduncled, about 1.5 cm long, cone-like, ellipsoid, persistent;nutlets compressed, with narrow wings, persistent, style remaining at the top.
key_features: 40 cm across
Leaves alternate, elliptic, oblong to ovate-oblong, 6–12 cm long, 2–5 cm wide, acuminate at apex, br
branchlets glabrous or slightly pubescent when young
documents.identification_guide:
【葉】 | 形狀：oblong, elliptic, ovate | 尺寸：6–12 cm long; 2–5 cm wide
【花】 | 形狀：rounded, rhombic
【毛被】branchlets glabrous or slightly pubescent when young

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：japonica
學名：fig. 662.

=== 識別重點 ===
【花】 | 形狀：triangular

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 5–15 cm tall
2. Male flowers with a short calyx tube, lobes triangular, 0

=== 詳細描述 ===
Small parasitic subshrubs, 5–15 cm tall. Branches with internodes of various lengths, flat.Male flowers with a short calyx tube, lobes triangular, 0.5 mm long, 0.3 mm broad, concave, apex reflexed; synandrium depressed-globose, 0.25 mm across. Female flowers sessile, calyx lobes small, broadly triangular.Fruit obovoid, ca. 2 mm long, 1.3 mm broad, apex rounded.
key_features: 5–15 cm tall
Male flowers with a short calyx tube, lobes triangular, 0
documents.identification_guide: 【花】 | 形狀：triangular

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：lotoides
學名：Glinus lotoides

=== 識別重點 ===
【毛被】Annual herbs with white stellate hairs

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 5-20 mm wide
2. Annual herbs with white stellate hairs
3. blade ovate to obovate, obtuse, 1
4. Annual herbs with white stellate hairs

=== 詳細描述 ===
Annual herbs with white stellate hairs. Stems prostrate-ascending.Leaves opposite or ternate; petiole 0.3-1.5 cm long; blade ovate to obovate, obtuse, 1.0-3.2 cm long, 5-20 mm wide.Flowers subsessile; sepals oblong, mucronate, 3-10 mm long, glabrous adaxially, stellate-pubescent abaxially; stamens mostly 5-10; styles 5.Capsules oblong, 5-valved.
key_features: 5-20 mm wide
Annual herbs with white stellate hairs
blade ovate to obovate, obtuse, 1
Annual herbs with white stellate hairs
documents.identification_guide: 【毛被】Annual herbs with white stellate hairs

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：maximowicziana
學名：Atriplex maximowicziana

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：obtuse, ovate | 尺寸：1-4 cm long; 7-18 mm wide
【莖】 | 尺寸：100 cm tall

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 100 cm tall
2. Leaves alternate or lower ones subopposite, ovate to trullate, 1-4 cm long, 7-18 mm wide, obtuse to 

=== 詳細描述 ===
Perennial herbs; stems to 100 cm tall, procumbent or erect, suffrescent at base, densely farinose; branches ascending, angled.Leaves alternate or lower ones subopposite, ovate to trullate, 1-4 cm long, 7-18 mm wide, obtuse to mucronulate at apex, cuneate at base, entire.Plants monoecious; staminate inflorescence a terminal densely packed spike, ca. 1 cm long; tepals 5, obovate; stamens 5; pistillate inflorescences smaller spikes clustered into a panicle.Utricles sessile, fascicled, bracts compressed, trullate-rhombic, 6-9 mm long, more or less toothed at base, connate only at base.
key_features: 100 cm tall
Leaves alternate or lower ones subopposite, ovate to trullate, 1-4 cm long, 7-18 mm wide, obtuse to
documents.identification_guide:
【葉】 | 形狀：obtuse, ovate | 尺寸：1-4 cm long; 7-18 mm wide
【莖】 | 尺寸：100 cm tall

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：aralioides
學名：pl. 39, 40.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：elliptic, lanceolate, ovate | 顏色：green
【質地】Leaves coriaceous, broadly ovate to lanceolate-elliptic or rarely elliptic, deep

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 5-10.5 cm long
2. in diam, the bark dark brown to black
3. Leaves coriaceous, broadly ovate to lanceolate-elliptic or rarely elliptic, deep green, glossy, 5-10

=== 詳細描述 ===
Evergreen tree, usually 4-25 m high, with trunk to 5 m. in diam, the bark dark brown to black; banchlets stout; terminal buds with papyraceous scales.Leaves coriaceous, broadly ovate to lanceolate-elliptic or rarely elliptic, deep green, glossy, 5-10.5 cm long, 3-8 cm broad, rounded or broad obtuse at base, acuminate to cuspidate at apex, slighly thicker and undulate at margin, entire at the lower part, serrulate distally, pinnate-nerved; petiole 3-8 cm long.Inflorescece 6-10 cm long, 14- to 23-flowered, bract thin-papyraceous, linear, 1-2 cm long; pedicels 1-3 cm long, in fruit much longer; stamnes 40-75, spreading at first in protandrous tree and downard in protogynous tree, filaments erect when shedding pollen; carpels (5-)7-11, with 16-30 ovules.Follicetum 6-10 mm wide, with persistent dry stigma;seeds 5-12 per follicle, linear ellipsoid, 3-4 mm long.
key_features: 5-10.5 cm long
in diam, the bark dark brown to black
Leaves coriaceous, broadly ovate to lanceolate-elliptic or rarely elliptic, deep green, glossy, 5-10
documents.identification_guide:
【葉】 | 形狀：elliptic, lanceolate, ovate | 顏色：green
【質地】Leaves coriaceous, broadly ovate to lanceolate-elliptic or rarely elliptic, deep

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：nucifera
學名：pl. 19.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 顏色：green | 尺寸：20-60 cm in diameter
【花】 | 顏色：pink, white | 形狀：elliptic
【毛被】Leaves centrally peltate, margins entire or slightly wavy, circular, 20-60 cm in diameter, pale gree

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 20-60 cm in diameter
2. Leaves centrally peltate, margins entire or slightly wavy, circular, 20-60 cm in diameter, pale gree
3. petals many, broadly elliptic, concave, white or pink
4. Leaves centrally peltate, margins entire or slightly wavy, circular, 20-60 cm in diameter, pale gree

=== 詳細描述 ===
Perennial herbs with horizontal rhizomes.Leaves centrally peltate, margins entire or slightly wavy, circular, 20-60 cm in diameter, pale green to green, glabrous above, green beneath; petioles 1-2 m long, short spined.Flowers showy, solitary, 10-25 cm across, fragrant; peduncle 1-2 m long, sepals 4 or 5, caducous; petals many, broadly elliptic, concave, white or pink; stamens numerous.Fruit aggregate, embedded in an enlarged receptacle, ellipsoid or ovoid, 1-1.7 cm long, the top protruding, reddish-brown.
key_features: 20-60 cm in diameter
Leaves centrally peltate, margins entire or slightly wavy, circular, 20-60 cm in diameter, pale gree
petals many, broadly elliptic, concave, white or pink
Leaves centrally peltate, margins entire or slightly wavy, circular, 20-60 cm in diameter, pale gree
documents.identification_guide:
【葉】 | 顏色：green | 尺寸：20-60 cm in diameter
【花】 | 顏色：pink, white | 形狀：elliptic
【毛被】Leaves centrally peltate, margins entire or slightly wavy, circular, 20-60 cm in diameter, pale gree

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：arguta
學名：photo 285.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：rounded, elliptic, ovate | 顏色：green | 尺寸：4-10 cm long; 10 cm long
【花】 | 顏色：greenish, green, yellow, white
【果】 | 形狀：oblong
【毛被】branchlets glabrescent
【質地】Leaves chartaceous, elliptic to broadly elliptic, sometimes broadly ovate, 4-10 

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 10 m long
2. pith light brown, lamellate
3. Leaves chartaceous, elliptic to broadly elliptic, sometimes broadly ovate, 4-10 cm
4. branchlets glabrescent

=== 詳細描述 ===
Tall climbing shrubs to 10 m long; branchlets glabrescent; pith light brown, lamellate.Leaves chartaceous, elliptic to broadly elliptic, sometimes broadly ovate, 4-10 cm. long, 3-8 cm broad, acuminate or cuspidate at apex, rounded or subcordate at base, margins densely serrulate, upper surface dark green, lower surface light green, young Leaves tomentose on veins, glabrescent, hairs remaining only in tufts in vein axils on lower surface, lateral veins ca. 6 or 7 per side; petioles 2-6 cm long.Infolrescences axillary, 1-10-flowered, 1 or 2-branched cymes, sparsely pubescent; flowers white; sepals sparsely tomentose on margins, ovoid or elliptic; ovary glabrous.Fruit ovoid to oblong, ca. 2-3 cm long, green or greenish-yellow, rostrate, glabrous, unspotted, calyx deciduous.
key_features: 10 m long
pith light brown, lamellate
Leaves chartaceous, elliptic to broadly elliptic, sometimes broadly ovate, 4-10 cm
branchlets glabrescent

【果】 | 形狀：oblong

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：decumbens
學名：Corydalis decumbens

=== 識別重點 ===
【花】 | 顏色：blue, purple
【莖】 | 尺寸：10-30 cm long; 30 cm long
【毛被】stems tufted, slender, glabrous, decumbent, erect above, 10-30 cm long

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 10-30 cm long
2. Flowers rose to blue-purple, few, in racemes
3. leaflets 2- to 3-parted or -cleft, segmants thin, oblanceolate to obovate, 1-2 cm long, 3-7 mm wide
4. stems tufted, slender, glabrous, decumbent, erect above, 10-30 cm long

=== 詳細描述 ===
Glaucescent perennial herbs with globose tubers; stems tufted, slender, glabrous, decumbent, erect above, 10-30 cm long.Leaves few, the radical ones long-petioled, 2- to 3-ternate; leaflets 2- to 3-parted or -cleft, segmants thin, oblanceolate to obovate, 1-2 cm long, 3-7 mm wide; cauline leaves usually 2, short-petioled, 2-ternate.Flowers rose to blue-purple, few, in racemes; bracts rhombic-ovate, entire, subacute.Capsules linear, ca. 2 cm long, slightly torulose; seeds dark brown, minutely mammillate.
key_features: 10-30 cm long
Flowers rose to blue-purple, few, in racemes
leaflets 2- to 3-parted or -cleft, segmants thin, oblanceolate to obovate, 1-2 cm long, 3-7 mm wide
stems tufted, slender, glabrous, decumbent, erect above, 10-30 cm long

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：longicarpa
學名：Astilbe longicarpa

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：cordate, truncate, ovate, obtuse, lanceolate | 尺寸：7–13 cm long; 2–5 cm wide
【花】 | 顏色：white | 形狀：ovate
【毛被】A perennial, pubescent, erect herb, 40–150 cm high

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 30–60 cm long
2. flowers white, small, short pedicellate
3. Radical and cauline leaves long-petiolate, ternate-bipinnate, lateral and terminal leaflets ovate-la
4. A perennial, pubescent, erect herb, 40–150 cm high

=== 詳細描述 ===
A perennial, pubescent, erect herb, 40–150 cm high.Radical and cauline leaves long-petiolate, ternate-bipinnate, lateral and terminal leaflets ovate-lanceolate, cordate, truncate or obtuse at base, acuminate at apex, 7–13 cm long, 2–5 cm wide, the margins duplicate-serrate.Inflorescence terminal, paniculate, 30–60 cm long, the axis with short glandular hairs; flowers white, small, short pedicellate; calyx 5-lobed, the lobes ovate, 1.5–2 mm long; petals spathulate, about 1 mm long; stamens 10.Capsules about 4 mm long; seeds small, numerous.
key_features: 30–60 cm long
flowers white, small, short pedicellate
Radical and cauline leaves long-petiolate, ternate-bipinnate, lateral and terminal leaflets ovate-la
A perennial, pubescent, erect herb, 40–150 cm high
documents.identification_guide:
【葉】 | 形狀：cordate, truncate, ovate, obtuse, lanceolate | 尺寸：7–13 cm long; 2–5 cm wide
【花】 | 顏色：white | 形狀：ovate

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：akoensis
學名：Acalypha akoensis

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：cordate, rounded, acute, ovate | 尺寸：12–16 cm long; 16 cm long
【莖】 | 顏色：reddish
【毛被】petioles 6–9 cm long, densely pubescent

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 16–20 cm long
2. branches reddish, terete, subglabrous
3. Leaves membranaceous, ovate, 12–16 cm long, 8–11 cm broad, the apex cuspidate-acute, the base cuneat
4. petioles 6–9 cm long, densely pubescent

=== 詳細描述 ===
A shrub; branches reddish, terete, subglabrous.Leaves membranaceous, ovate, 12–16 cm long, 8–11 cm broad, the apex cuspidate-acute, the base cuneate-cordate or rounded-cordate, the margins serrulate, sparingly pilose on both surfaces; petioles 6–9 cm long, densely pubescent; stipules lanceolate, 12 mm long, acuminate.Male spikes filiform, recurved, 16–20 cm long, villose; peduncles 1 cm long. Female spikes slender, 5–9 cm long, pubescent; peduncles 1 cm long; bracts ovate, 3.5 mm long, 5 mm broad, 10-dentate, pubescent outside; bracteoles minute; ovary 3-lobed, hirsute; styles about 2.5 mm long.
key_features: 16–20 cm long
branches reddish, terete, subglabrous
Leaves membranaceous, ovate, 12–16 cm long, 8–11 cm broad, the apex cuspidate-acute, the base cuneat
petioles 6–9 cm long, densely pubescent

【莖】 | 顏色：reddish

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：chittagonga
學名：pl. 283.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 尺寸：14 cm long
【花】 | 顏色：yellow | 形狀：obtuse, elliptic, rounded
【莖】 | 顏色：silvery
【毛被】petals 4, yellow, glabrous, obovate-elliptic, concave, about 3
【質地】leaflets 5–6, alternate or opposite, elliptic to obovate, acute at apex, cuneate

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 14 cm long
2. branches and branchlets densely silvery stellate-lepidote
3. leaflets 5–6, alternate or opposite, elliptic to obovate, acute at apex, cuneate at base, coriaceous
4. petals 4, yellow, glabrous, obovate-elliptic, concave, about 3

=== 詳細描述 ===
A medium-sized tree; branches and branchlets densely silvery stellate-lepidote.Leaves about 14 cm long, imparipinnate, or partly paripinnate, the rachis and petioles lepidote; leaflets 5–6, alternate or opposite, elliptic to obovate, acute at apex, cuneate at base, coriaceous, 2.5–7.5 cm long, 2–2.5 cm broad, green-lepidote above, densely silvery lepidote beneath, the lateral veins about 4 on each side of the midrib, the midrib elevated above, distinctly elevated beneath; petioles 3–6 mm long.Panicle axillary, the rachis densely lepidote, 3–4 cm long; pedicels 1–2 mm long; calyx lepidote, 4–5-lobed, the lobes obtuse or rounded at apex; petals 4, yellow, glabrous, obovate-elliptic, concave, about 3.5 mm long, free from the staminal tube, the staminal tube about 3 mm long; anthers 8, ovate oblong, about 0.8 mm long, glabrous, sessile, inserted on the upper portion of the tube; ovary ovate, pubescent, the style none, the stigma ovate.Capsule obovate, densely lepidote, about 3 cm long, 2.2 cm across, 3-valved.
key_features: 14 cm long
branches and branchlets densely silvery stellate-lepidote
leaflets 5–6, alternate or opposite, elliptic to obovate, acute at apex, cuneate at base, coriaceous
petals 4, yellow, glabrous, obovate-elliptic, concave, about 3

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：albopurpurascens
學名：pl. 14b.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：oblong, lanceolate
【花】 | 形狀：oblong, ovate
【毛被】branchlets pubescent at first, soon glabrous
【質地】5–13 cm long, 1–4 cm broad, caudate to acuminate at apex, obtuse to cuneate at b

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 2.5–13 cm long
2. 5–13 cm long, 1–4 cm broad, caudate to acuminate at apex, obtuse to cuneate at base, coriaceous, pal
3. Leaves persistent, oblong-lanceolate, 2
4. branchlets pubescent at first, soon glabrous

=== 詳細描述 ===
Trees, evergreen, up to 15 m high; branchlets pubescent at first, soon glabrous.Leaves persistent, oblong-lanceolate, 2.5–13 cm long, 1–4 cm broad, caudate to acuminate at apex, obtuse to cuneate at base, coriaceous, pale green and glabrous above, white-purplish glaucous beneath, densely pubescent when young, 3-nerved at base, nerves slightly raised beneath; petioles 0.7–3.5 cm long, glaucous.Flowers small; pedicels short, 1.5–2 mm long; sepals 5, rounded ovate; petals 5, oblong ovate; disk not distinct, hairy appendages abundant; stamens 8. Pistillate flowers 6 mm across; sepals 1.5 mm long, pubescent outside; petals 3 mm long; staminodes short, anthers oblong, 1 mm long, filament shorter; ovary broadly rounded, styles 2, long, recurved downwards. Staminate flowers 4.5 mm across; stamens 1.5 mm long. Inflorescence cymose.samara glabrous; each wing with the semicarp 1.5–2.5 cm long; lower edges of two wings spreading at angles of 60–75 degree.
key_features: 2.5–13 cm long
5–13 cm long, 1–4 cm broad, caudate to acuminate at apex, obtuse to cuneate at base, coriaceous, pal

branchlets pubescent at first, soon glabrous

A scandent shrub, branchlets glabrous, terete, yellowish and turning to black when dri
ed.Leaves papyriferous, ovate, 2–4 cm long, 1–1.5 cm wide, glabrous on both surfaces, the lateral veins 9–11 per side, parallel and prominent, acute at apex and obtuse at base; the margin entire or obscurely repand; petioles glabrous, 6–10 mm long.Inflorescences terminal, pseudo-racemose, glabrous, 12–15 cm long, simple or with very short branches at the base; flowers 6–15, fascicled, pedicels 3–6 mm long; calyx triangular, acute at apex.

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 6.5–17.5 cm long
2. Capsules succulent, ellipsoid, 10–15 mm long, black
3. Leaves mostly membranaceous, alternate, distichous, oblong, 6
4. 5 cm long, 2–7 cm broad, acute, obtuse to short-attenuate at base, inconspicuously crenulate-serrula

=== 詳細描述 ===
Small evergreen trees; branchlets flexuous.Leaves mostly membranaceous, alternate, distichous, oblong, 6.5–17.5 cm long, 2–7 cm broad, acute, obtuse to short-attenuate at base, inconspicuously crenulate-serrulate, glabrous, the midrib and veins elevated on both surfaces; petioles 2–3 cm long, puberulous, bracteate at base;sepals puberulous, 1.5 mm long; petals absent; stamens 8, 0.6 mm long; filaments pubescent, united at base with short alternating staminodes (0.3 mm long) into a tube.Capsules succulent, ellipsoid, 10–15 mm long, black.

學名：Ammannia baccifera

=== 識別重點 ===

【毛被】5 mm long, glabrous
【質地】leaves membranous, oblanceolate to linear, 5–50 mm long, 1–10 mm wide, narrowed 

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 10–50 cm long
2. leaves membranous, oblanceolate to linear, 5–50 mm long, 1–10 mm wide, narrowed at both ends, entire
3. 5 mm long, glabrous

=== 詳細描述 ===
An annual herb; much-branched annual; stems 10–50 cm long, 4-angled;leaves membranous, oblanceolate to linear, 5–50 mm long, 1–10 mm wide, narrowed at both ends, entire;flowers few, in dense axillary fascicles, the pedicels 0.2–1.5 mm long, glabrous; calyx 1–2 mm long, the lobes 0.5-0.7 mm long; petals absent; stamens 4, the anthers subglobose; styles 0.3-0.5 mm long; capsules globose, 1–1.5 rnm across, slightly exserted from the calyx.Commonly growing with A. multiflora together in paddy fields with lower and less branched stem.

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：formosanum
學名：pl. 860.

=== 識別重點 ===
【花】 | 顏色：white | 形狀：linear, obtuse, oblanceolate
【毛被】Stems branched at base, creeping below, ascending above, up to 15 cm high, somewhat hairy
【質地】Fruit a subglobase nut, included in the thin membranous calyx: seeds solitary, h

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 12–23 mm long
2. A low perennial herb, becoming black when dry
3. blade up to 10 mm long, deltoid to ovate, acute, subtruncate or obtuse at base, entire, 12–23 mm lon
4. Stems branched at base, creeping below, ascending above, up to 15 cm high, somewhat hairy

=== 詳細描述 ===
A low perennial herb, becoming black when dry. Stems branched at base, creeping below, ascending above, up to 15 cm high, somewhat hairy.Leaves petiolate, the upper alternate, the lower opposite; blade up to 10 mm long, deltoid to ovate, acute, subtruncate or obtuse at base, entire, 12–23 mm long, 10–16 mm wide, pilose above, along veins beneath. Stipules opposite, adnate to petioles, membranaceous, reflexed ovate-deltoid, acuminate, slightly fimbricate-ciliate at margin.Flowers white monoecious, axillary, sessile, both staminate and pistillate arranged at the same nodes; perianth of staminate flowers deeply 3-lobed, the segments oblanceolate, reflexed and obtuse at apex, 1-nerved, 3 mm long; stamens 3–8; anthers linear, opening longitudinally, the filaments slender, pistillate flowers smaller, the perianth 3-lobed, the lobes small, obtuse; styles recurved; ovule solitary, basal.Fruit a subglobase nut, included in the thin membranous calyx: seeds solitary, hairy, with fleshy endosperm.This species differs from T. japonicum mainly by the number of stamens and the shape of pistillate flowers. This species is known from one locallity and has been collected twice only.
key_features: 12–23 mm long
A low perennial herb, becoming black when dry
blade up to 10 mm long, deltoid to ovate, acute, subtruncate or obtuse at base, entire, 12–23 mm lon
Stems branched at base, creeping below, ascending above, up to 15 cm high, somewhat hairy

=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：arvensis
學名：Lysimachia arvensis

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：rounded, acute, ovate | 尺寸：10–25 mm long; 5–15 mm wide
【花】 | 顏色：reddish, purple | 形狀：linear, lanceolate, orbicular
【莖】 | 尺寸：10–30 cm long; 30 cm long
【毛被】Annual or biennial herbs, glabrous, whitish or glauous

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 10–30 cm long
2. Annual or biennial herbs, glabrous, whitish or glauous
3. Leaves opposite, sessile, ovate, 10–25 mm long, 5–15 mm wide, spreading, margins entire, apex acute 
4. Annual or biennial herbs, glabrous, whitish or glauous

=== 詳細描述 ===
Annual or biennial herbs, glabrous, whitish or glauous; stems 4-angled, many-branched, prostrate at base, 10–30 cm long.Leaves opposite, sessile, ovate, 10–25 mm long, 5–15 mm wide, spreading, margins entire, apex acute to subobtuse, base rounded.Flowers axillary, pedicel 2–3 cm long; calyx segments linear-lanceolate, long-acuminate, 4–6 mm long; corolla bluish-purple to reddish, lobes obovate-orbicular, apex serrate, often ciliolate.Capsules globose, dehiscence circumscissile; seeds small, dark brown.

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：curassavica
學名：pl. 976.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：oblong, lanceolate, acute | 尺寸：7–13 cm long; 13 cm long
【花】 | 顏色：red | 形狀：oblong, lanceolate, acute
【毛被】Herbs to 1 m tall, glabrous

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 7–13 cm long
2. corolla rotate, red, 7–9 mm long, lobes reflexed, oblong, acute, glabrous
3. Leaves opposite, lanceolate or oblong-lanceolate, apex acuminate or acute, base narrowed into a shor
4. Herbs to 1 m tall, glabrous

=== 詳細描述 ===
Herbs to 1 m tall, glabrous.Leaves opposite, lanceolate or oblong-lanceolate, apex acuminate or acute, base narrowed into a short petiole, blade glabrous, 7–13 cm long, 1.5–3.2 cm broad.Cymes 10–20-flowered, pubescent; peduncles 3–6 cm long; pedicels 1.2–2 cm long; calyx lobes 5, lanceolate, pubescent, reflexed at anthesis, ca. 4 mm long; corolla rotate, red, 7–9 mm long, lobes reflexed, oblong, acute, glabrous; corona orange, 3.5–4 mm long; gynostegium 2.5–3 mm long.Follicles one per pedicel, ovoid-oblong, glabrous, 5–8 cm long. Seeds flat, ovate, circular winged, 6–7 mm long, comose.

=== 詳細描述 ===

documents.text: === 基本資訊 === 植物名稱：formosana 學名：Patrinia formosana === 識別重點 === 【葉】 | 形狀：elliptic | 尺寸：14–23 cm long; 4–9 cm long 【花】 | 顏色：yellow | 形狀：linear 【莖】 | 尺寸：150 cm tall 【毛被】stems terete, erect, to 150 cm tall, base woody, robust, densely covered with retrorse hairs === 顯著特徵 === 1. 150 cm tall 2. corolla yellow, funnel-shaped, 3 mm long, segments spreading 3. Leaves simple, undivided, opposite, thin, lower leaves broadly elliptic, 14–23 cm long, 4 4. stems terete, erect, to 150 cm tall, base woody, robust, densely covered with retrorse hairs === 詳細描述 === Large perennial herbs; stems terete, erect, to 150 cm tall, base woody, robust, densely covered with retrorse hairs; upper branches opposite, spreading.Leaves simple, undivided, opposite, thin, lower leaves broadly elliptic, 14–23 cm long, 4.5–8 cm wide, long-petiolate, acuminate or acute at apex, attenuate at base, margins serrate, pubescent on both surfaces and on margins; lower leaves deciduous at anthesis; upper leaves gradually smaller, elliptic, 4–9 cm long, short petiolate or sessile, margins serrate, pubescent on both surfaces and on margins.Inflorescences terminal and axillary, duplicate-corymbose, densely pubescent; bracts narrowly lanceolate or elliptic, 2–5 cm long, 2 mm wide, pubescent; calyx minutely 5-lobed; corolla yellow, funnel-shaped, 3 mm long, segments spreading; stamens usually 2 (rarely 3), inserted at base of corolla tube, filaments linear, ca. 3 mm long, sparsely hairy; style linear 3 mm long, stigma capitate.Achenes ovoid, 3–4 mm long, winged, wings nearly orbicular, 6.5 mm across, with nerves distinctly anastomosing.This species is similar to P. villosa, but differs by having simple leaves, which are not deeply pinnately divided. First year plants are nearly stemless and the leaves are all basal, long- petioled, broadly elliptic, winged nearly to base of petiole, with margins nearly crenate or slightly serrate at apex and pubescent throughout. These leaves are 14–24 cm long, 5–8 cm wide, much larger than the cauline leaves produced in the following season.
key_features: 150 cm tall
corolla yellow, funnel-shaped, 3 mm long, segments spreading

stems terete, erect, to 150 cm tall, base woody, robust, densely covered with retrorse hairs

documents.text:
=== 基本資訊 ===
植物名稱：zeylanica
學名：pl. 24.

=== 識別重點 ===
【葉】 | 形狀：oblong, elliptic, lanceolate | 尺寸：2–9 cm long; 3–20 mm wide
【花】 | 顏色：white
【莖】 | 尺寸：20–70 cm tall; 70 cm tall

=== 顯著特徵 ===
1. 20–70 cm tall
2. corolla short-campanulate, white, ca
3. Leaves oblong, elliptic, or lanceolate, 2–9 cm long, 3–20 mm wide

=== 詳細描述 ===
Stems 20–70 cm tall.Leaves oblong, elliptic, or lanceolate, 2–9 cm long, 3–20 mm wide; petioles 2–10 mm long.Inflorescence 8-20 mm long, 6–8 cm in diameter; corolla short-campanulate, white, ca. 1 mm long.Capsule globose, 3 mm long.Chromosome number n = 12, 16, 20, 21, 24.
